job_description:
This position requires provicient in English and willingness to go to site visit project or to be placed in projects throughout Indonesia.

Scoop of duties :
- Assist to prepare engineering drawings, create 2D and 3D models using software like AutoCAD, and assist in the analysis and design of structures and systems.
-  Conduct site visits and inspections with Mentor to verify conditions, monitor progress, and ensure quality and safety standards are met.
- Help prepare reports, technical documents, and presentations, and maintain records and logs.
- Support project coordination activities and communicate with project stakeholders.
